title: Desk-tools
subtitle: A high-performance, local-first utility platform with 47 developer tools.
description: Originally created for multi-tasking individuals at startups. With the advancement of AI, the lines between developer, designer, planner, and marketer are collapsing. Desk-tools is designed to empower this new breed of hybrid professionals by providing a comprehensive suite of utilities in one place.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: All data stays on your device. No cloud storage, no tracking. Your notes and tasks are stored locally in your browser.

search.title: Instant Search
search.description: Find any tool quickly using the tag-based fuzzy search in the sidebar.

evolving.title: Constantly Evolving
evolving.description: I am committed to adding more challenging and useful tools. Have a request? File an issue on GitHub!

browseTools.label: Browse Tools:
browseTools.text: Use the sidebar on the right to navigate through the collection of utilities. Tools are categorized for easy access.

productivity.label: Productivity:
productivity.text: Access the Kanban Board to manage your tasks and the Notepad for quick jottings from the top navigation bar.

whiteboard.label: Whiteboard:
whiteboard.text: Use the Whiteboard to sketch out ideas or diagrams and export them as images.

terms.label: Definition of Terms:
terms.text: Organize your project terminology in the Terms section.

feedback.label: Feedback & Requests:
feedback.text: If you need a specific tool or have a feature request, please open an issue on GitHub. I will continue to update the platform with new features.

roadmap.title: Future Roadmap
roadmap.description: I aim to build more complex and "challenging" tools that solve real-world engineering problems directly in the browser. This project is a living workspace that grows with your needs.
